metadata.baseline_standard: RFC 8725 (JSON Web Token Best Current Practices)

controls.title: Algorithm Allow-list Pinning
controls.requirement: Decode path must pin allowed algorithms and reject implicit algorithm negotiation.

controls.title: Issuer and Audience Validation
controls.requirement: Decode path must validate issuer and audience against explicit contract values.

controls.title: Explicit Token Type Binding
controls.requirement: Approval token payload must include explicit token type and decode path must enforce it.

controls.title: Temporal Claim Enforcement
controls.requirement: Decode path must require and validate exp, iat, and nbf claims.

controls.title: Business Binding Claims
controls.requirement: Token must carry tenant/project/decision/resource binding claims and consume path must enforce mismatch rejection.

controls.title: Replay Safety
controls.requirement: Token consume path must enforce one-time use with deterministic replay rejection.

controls.title: Rotation-Compatible Verification
controls.requirement: Decode path must support secure fallback verification secrets during staged key rotation.
